title: Migrate Products to Firestore
description: Move the product catalog from the static 'src/lib/products.ts' file to a 'products' collection in Firestore to allow dynamic management.

title: Migrate Blog Posts to Firestore
description: Move blog content from the static arrays in the component files to a 'blog' collection in Firestore.

title: Implement Firestore Security Rules
description: Write and deploy comprehensive security rules to protect all Firestore collections (users, logs, refillRequests, roadmap, etc.). This is a critical security step.

title: Build User Activity Timeline
description: Create the dedicated page for viewing a single user's activity log, linked from the 'View all activity' button in the user management dialog.

title: Implement Real Appointment Booking
description: Connect the 'Book Appointment' buttons to a Firestore collection, allowing patients to schedule real appointments that admins can view and manage.

title: Integrate a Payment Gateway
description: Integrate Stripe or another payment provider into the checkout page to handle real financial transactions.

title: Implement Cloud Functions for Notifications
description: Write and deploy Firebase Cloud Functions to send real email/SMS notifications when important events happen (e.g., new refill request, approved order).

title: Develop Doctor/Driver Dashboards
description: Create specialized dashboard views for users with 'Doctor' or 'Delivery Driver' roles to manage their specific tasks.

title: User Authentication & Firestore Setup
description: Initial setup of Firebase Auth and core Firestore collections like users, logs, and refill requests.

title: Build Patient Dashboard
description: Create the main dashboard for logged-in patients, including the 'day at a glance' feature.
